faq.question: Do NRBs need to file tax returns in Bangladesh?
faq.answer: Yes. If you hold a TIN or earn income in Bangladesh (rental, business, capital gains), you are required to file a tax return regardless of your residency status.

faq.question: Can I file my Bangladesh tax return while living abroad?
faq.answer: Absolutely. Our entire process is remote-friendly. You submit documents online, and we handle the full e-return filing with NBR on your behalf.

faq.question: What is dual taxation and how does it affect me?
faq.answer: Dual taxation occurs when income is taxed in both your country of residence and Bangladesh. Bangladesh has Double Taxation Avoidance Agreements (DTAA) with several countries. We help you navigate these to avoid paying tax twice.

faq.question: Is my rental income in Bangladesh taxable?
faq.answer: Yes. Rental income from property in Bangladesh is taxable, and you must declare it in your tax return. We help calculate the correct tax liability and claim eligible deductions.

faq.question: How do I send my documents securely?
faq.answer: We use encrypted channels for document transfer. You can upload documents through our secure portal or share via encrypted email. Your data confidentiality is our top priority.
